content: {"heading":"Welcome to Graduate Futures","subheading":"We're the leading careers body in higher education, with a vibrant community spanning the entire employability mission. We help universities turn learning into fulfilling careers, stronger workplaces and a fairer society.","buttonText":"Find out more","buttonLink":"#"}
{"leftHeading":"Left Column","leftContent":"Content for the left column goes here.","rightHeading":"Right Column","rightContent":"Content for the right column goes here."}
{"heading":"Welcome to Our Website","subheading":"Create amazing experiences with our platform","buttonText":"Get Started","buttonLink":"#"}

{"opacity":0.9,"backgroundImage":"https://base44.app/api/apps/68efc20f3e0a30fafad6dde7/files/public/68efc20f3e0a30fafad6dde7/fe3424aa3_WhatsAppImage2025-11-19at114526.jpeg","header":"About Graduate Futures","text":"The Graduate Futures Institute is higher education’s leading body for careers and employability, uniquely spanning the full employability mission across institutions.

We bring together the largest university careers and employability community in the UK and Ireland to work for brighter futures for graduates and the communities they go on to shape.

Employability matters beyond helping students secure a graduate job. It’s about helping people to discover their sense of purpose, understand their strengths and make informed choices. 

Our members equip individuals with the tools and confidence to navigate an ever-changing labour market, while supporting their growth as active citizens who make a positive difference to their communities and workplaces.
","borderStyle":"none"}

{"rows":4,"cols":2,"cells":{"0-0":"https://base44.app/api/apps/68efc20f3e0a30fafad6dde7/files/public/68efc20f3e0a30fafad6dde7/850530b5a_Welcome.png","0-1":"

Welcome

We’re an inclusive community for everyone who contributes to careers and employability.

","1-0":"https://base44.app/api/apps/68efc20f3e0a30fafad6dde7/files/public/68efc20f3e0a30fafad6dde7/989467aa9_Impact.png","1-1":"

Impact

We make a measurable difference to students and society.

","2-1":"

Leadership

We provide a strategic voice that informs institutional decision making and national policy, while leading professional standards in careers and employability.

","2-0":"https://base44.app/api/apps/68efc20f3e0a30fafad6dde7/files/public/68efc20f3e0a30fafad6dde7/4d06c620d_Leadership.png","3-1":"

Dynamic

We never stand still. We support members to anticipate trends in labour markets, technology and policy. We create space to experiment and develop ideas to drive the sector forward.

","3-0":"https://base44.app/api/apps/68efc20f3e0a30fafad6dde7/files/public/68efc20f3e0a30fafad6dde7/43991996b_Dynamic.png"},"borderColor":"","headerBgColor":"#f8fafc","cellTypes":{"0-0":"image","1-1":"text","1-0":"image","2-0":"image","3-0":"image"},"tableWidth":"half","tableAlign":"center","header":"Our values are WILD ","backgroundColor":"#fafafa","borderStyle":"none"}

{"heading":"Section Heading","text":"As the leading voices for careers and employability in higher education, our communications team work with journalists across the UK. We provide commentary on topical news and can provide case studies and interviews with a range of experts in careers and employability. 


How to contact the communications team
We are available from Monday – Friday 8.30 am – 5pm. If you are a UK journalist with a media enquiry please contact us using the details below

Please note that, as a small team, we're unable to assist with student requests, or support articles or broadcast items that have not yet been commissioned. 

"}
